SEARCH
Package Client.View.Gui

Class Gui

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
Client.View.View
Client.View.Gui.Gui
All Implemented Interfaces:
RemoteView, Serializable, Remote
public class Gui extends View
This class represents a graphic interface for the application. It extends the View class and provides methods for interacting with the user scenes and active listeners. The GUI communicates with GuiApplication and displays the game board, chat messages, and player updates.
See Also:
